title: Domain 4.2: Summarize aspects of client-side virtualization.
content:
💻 Purpose of Virtual Machines

🧪 Sandbox

Safe, isolated environment for testing or malware analysis.

🧠 Example: Test a suspicious attachment safely.

👨‍💻 Test Development

Run multiple OSes or configs for development/testing apps.

🧠 Example: Test a web app on Windows and Linux.

📦 Application Virtualization

  • Legacy Support: Run old apps/OS (e.g., Windows XP)
  • Cross-Platform: Run Windows apps on macOS (e.g., Parallels, VirtualBox)

⚙️ Resource Requirements

  • CPU: Must support virtualization (Intel VT / AMD-V)
  • RAM: Each VM needs its own allocation
  • Disk Space: VMs stored as large files (.vhd, .vmdk)

🧠 Tip: If VMs lag or crash, check RAM/CPU availability.

🔒 Security Requirements

  • Patch VM OS just like a physical machine
  • Use antivirus if VM accesses the internet
  • Isolate VM from host network if needed
  • Disable shared clipboard/folders when testing malware

🧠 Note: VM escape is rare, but isolation protects your host.
